title: Titici Alloi adds PAT.H flexing comfort to new alloy gravel bike – Updated
content:
Vibration damping isn’t always something we think of with alloy bikes, but by adapting Titici’s Plate Absorber Tech, now in a Hydroformed iteration (PAT.H), gravel…
